paper_abstract: This paper studies a dual-hop amplify-and-forward (AF) relaying systems over shadowed Nakagami-m fading channels and derives an approximate analytical expression for the outage probability. The numerical results show that the derived analytical expression can provide very well approximations to the simulation results.
paper_title: Outage Probability of Dual-Hop Amplify-and-Forward Relaying Systems over Shadowed Nakagami-m Fading Channels
